techmeme.title: Sources: Ilya Sutskever's Safe Superintelligence is in talks to raise funding at a valuation of $20B+, up from a $5B valuation from its September funding round (Reuters)
Paris prosecutors open a probe into X over alleged algorithmic distortions, after an MP's complaint that X was using biased algorithms (Dominique Vidalon/Reuters)
Microsoft, Alphabet, Amazon, and Meta reported a combined $246B capex in 2024, up 63% YoY from $151B, and forecast that their 2025 spending could exceed $320B (Financial Times)
Sources: SoftBank is set to invest $40B in OpenAI at a $260B pre-money valuation; OpenAI was last valued at $157B by private investors in October 2024 (Hayden Field/CNBC)
WBD took $300M in gaming writedowns in 2024; current and former staff blame a lack of a strong, cohesive vision during former games chief David Haddad's tenure (Jason Schreier/Bloomberg)
